#include <bits/stdc++.h>
 using namespace std;

int d(int a){
	int ret=0;
	while(a>0){
		if(a%2) ret+= a%10;
		else ret+= (a%10)*2;
		a/=10;
	}
	return ret%10;
}
int main(){
    int t; cin >> t;
	while(t--){
		int a,b; cin >> a >> b;
		int remain1 =0, remain2=0;
		b++;
		while((b)%10) remain1 += d(--b);
		while((a)%10) remain2 += d(--a);
		//cout << remain1 << " " << remain2 << endl;
		if(a==-1) remain2 = a = 0;
		cout << remain1 + (b/10)*45 - remain2 - (a/10)*45 << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
